Email_1.Body:
You did an okay job today, but that is why we
    have the simulation, so you can get some
    practice before you go into the real thing.
            
    Well, on to business matters. You are going to
    perform a real Pipeline Extraction. We suspect
    that their is a person in possession of
    illegal items.
            
    Good luck, I know you will do fine.

Email_2.Body:
It’s okay newbie, we all can’t be naturally
    talented. Well, just try to be more observant
    next time.
